cast.title: Head Games

cast.overview: Bringing together some of the top names in music and entertainment, both Intuit Dome and the Kia Forum will host FireAid on Thursday, January 30, to raise money for rebuilding communities devastated by wildfires and supporting efforts to prevent future fire disasters throughout Southern California.
cast.title: FireAid Benefit Concert

cast.overview: When his nephew Leslie, is implicated in the theft of the mob’s earnings, Morris gets a call from his old boss that forces him off the golf course and back into action to negotiate one last job: he’s got the weekend to to help the kid recover the stolen money or put a bullet in him. Complicating things is the fact that Leslie has a baby on the way.
cast.title: Morris Stokes

cast.overview: A hitman poses as a priest to get close to his next target, a disgraced gangster turned FBI informant, who visits the church on a regular basis.
cast.title: St. Vincent

cast.overview: All Saints tread the path of jazzy, funky videos, spliced with interviews with the girls themselves and live footage of their travels around the world.
cast.title: All Saints: The Video

cast.overview: Behind the scenes of the legendary classic film by Quentin Tarantino.
cast.title: Pulp Fiction: The Facts

cast.overview: A newly retired and long-revered general who returns to his hometown in rural Georgia after the death of his wife to find it in the throes of corruption, gentrification and racism. Using battle-honed strategy and combat skills, he’ll wage all-out war against the town and the billionaire exploiting it.
cast.title: Man of War

cast.original_title: Opening the Tombs of the Golden Mummies: Live
cast.overview: Excavations in Egypt's Valley of the Golden Mummies reveal a king's untouched tomb.
cast.title: Opening the Tombs of the Golden Mummies: Live

cast.overview: When wealthy criminal mastermind Jack Wolfe is cornered by the Feds, he plans to fake his own death and claim the $30 million life insurance payout with his “grieving” wife Nora, while framing her surfer lover Chad for his murder. But Nora is cooking up a scheme of her own: kill Jack for real, frame Chad and keep the fortune for herself. As lies unravel, Nora and Jack scramble to outsmart one another, leaving one burning question: who will come out on top in this twisted game of life and death?
cast.title: Just Play Dead

cast.original_title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - The Introduction
cast.overview: Tension builds as threats are carried out, stakes are raised and communication breaks down. In Los Santos a drive-by shooting in Grove Street Family's territory ignites a series of events in the days leading up to the start of the game.
cast.title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - The Introduction

cast.original_title: Marvel Studios: Building a Cinematic Universe
cast.overview: Feature-length documentary about the rise of Marvel Studios and their films leading up to, and including, The Avengers.
cast.title: Marvel Studios: Building a Cinematic Universe

cast.overview: A documentary on Kingsman: The Secret Service.
cast.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service Revealed

cast.overview: A battle between good and  evil in the middle eastern countries
cast.title: Death2kuffar

cast.overview: The third installment in the Incredibles franchise. Plot TBA.
cast.title: Incredibles 3

crew.overview: After twenty years in prison, Foley is finished with the grifter's life. When he meets an elusive young woman named Iris, the possibility of a new start looks real. But his past is proving to be a stubborn companion.
crew.title: The Samaritan

crew.overview: Single father and former cop Tom Cutler has an unusual occupation: he cleans up death scenes. But when he's called in to sterilize a wealthy suburban residence after a brutal shooting, Cutler is shocked to learn he may have unknowingly erased crucial evidence, entangling himself in a dirty criminal cover-up.
crew.title: Cleaner

crew.overview: Romulus, a misunderstood musician turned recluse hiding from personal demons in a New York City cave, finds the frozen body of a young drifter in a tree. The authorities, including his police officer daughter, claim the death is accidental. Romulus is convinced the man was murdered by a prominent art photographer but how can he prove he's right when everyone thinks he's insane?
crew.title: The Caveman's Valentine

crew.overview: Afro Samurai avenged his father and found a life of peace. But the legendary master is forced back into the game by a beautiful and deadly woman from his past. The sparks of violence dropped along Afro’s bloody path now burn out of control – and nowhere are the flames of hatred more intense than in the eyes of Sio.
crew.title: Afro Samurai: Resurrection

crew.overview: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.
crew.title: The 51st State

crew.overview: Summer heats up in rural Louisiana beside Eve’s Bayou, 1962, as the Batiste family tries to survive the secrets they’ve kept and the betrayals they’ve endured.
crew.title: Eve's Bayou

crew.overview: In the 1960s, two entrepreneurs hatch an ingenious business plan to fight for housing integration—and equal access to the American Dream.
crew.title: The Banker

crew.overview: Original pilot for the "Afro Samurai" TV series, directed and animated by Takeshi Koike before anime studio Gonzo took on the production of the final product four years later.
crew.title: Afro Samurai Pilot
